author: ralexstokes
content:
random question: the attester committee shufflings have 1 epoch of lookahead as they reference at the latest the (final) RANDAO mix (as an entropy input) of the previous epoch

the proposer shufflings use the same machinery for the RANDAO mix so on this front they have the same lookahead

the complication is that proposer shufflings are dependent on validator's effective balances which can change going into an epoch due to the epoch processing

i wonder if anyone has ever scanned the mainnet chain and determined the number of times the shuffling did in fact diverge from the 1 epoch lookahead compared to what the protocol dictates
